00400066:7b40401f000000 vol down
00400066:7740401f000000 vol up
00400066:7d40401f000000 ff
00400066:7e40401f000000 reverse
00400066:6f40401f000000 yes
00400066:5f40401f000000 no
00400066:7f50401f000000 back
00400066:7f60401f000000 enter
00400066:7f48401f000000 up
00400066:7f44401f000000 down
00400066:7f41401f000000 right
00400066:7f42401f000000 left


Brightness control: yy- irrelevant
xx- single relevant byte. 10 - lowest level
1d- highest
02e10df4:yy a9 yy yy yy f8 xx
